title: 你们觉得那把枪最好玩~！
author: yejingnan
txt_content: <iframe frameborder="no" border="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" width=330 height=86 src="http://music.163.com/outchain/player?type=2&id=27792448&auto=1&height=66"></iframe> 我觉得火鹰不错=￣ω￣=

replies.author: xiaoweng_jun
replies.txt_content: 电磁炮= =开一枪一大波僵尸跑来，话说你前面的一段乱码什么鬼= =

replies.txt_content: 电磁好看 可惜子弹太少
